name: Touchdown Run
description:
The most simple and addicting football game on the iPhone!

Your job is to take the football and dash between defenders until you score a touchdown. Make sure you read where the holes in the defense are and keep the pedal to the metal!

WHAT THEY ARE SAYING:

"great game simple fun easy. Its a great app" - raven100403

"Lots of fun. my high score is 84 so far. Really fun. Great idea for a game." - Zman2596

"The game is incredibly simple, but it's oddly addicting. Somehow good to play before a real game. It makes you think you can make it all the way in the real world too" - James Thornock

Only in this version:
- New players!
- Practice failed levels.
- Pause button.
- New sound effects.
- Additional awesome features!
